DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate whether woman take new combine oral contraceptive pill ( SH T00658ID , estradiol valerate/dienogest ) experience few hormone withdrawal-associated symptom pelvic pain headache monthly cycle compare commonly use contraceptive pill ( Microgynon ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect New Oral Contraceptive Pill Hormone Related Symptoms Such Pelvic Pain Headache
DOC.criteria: Age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) visit 1 , smoker 35 year ( inclusive ) Otherwise healthy female subject request contraception currently use levonorgestrel , gestodene desogestrel contain oral contraceptive 21day regimen suffer least moderate pelvic pain , headache define average value > /= 35 mm 3 high value visual analogue scale cycle day 2228 . Normal clinically insignificant cervical smear require follow ( normal result obtain within last 6 month screen ) Able tolerate ibuprofen willing use ibuprofen supply study . Women contraindication oral contraceptive use
